verses.text: \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*, \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w servant|strong="G1401"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w an|strong="G2532"\w* apostle \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w for|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*’s \w elect|strong="G1588"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w their|strong="G2532"\w* \w knowledge|strong="G1922"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* truth \w that|strong="G3588"\w* leads \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w godliness|strong="G2150"\w*,

\w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G1909"\w* \w hope|strong="G1680"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* eternal \w life|strong="G2222"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w who|strong="G3739"\w* cannot lie, \w promised|strong="G1861"\w* \w before|strong="G4253"\w* \w time|strong="G5550"\w* \w began|strong="G1909"\w*.\f + \fr 1:2 \ft Literally before times eternal\f*

\w In|strong="G1722"\w* \w His|strong="G1722"\w* \w own|strong="G2398"\w* \w time|strong="G2540"\w* \w He|strong="G1161"\w* \w has|strong="G2316"\w* \w made|strong="G5319"\w* \w His|strong="G1722"\w* \w word|strong="G3056"\w* \w evident|strong="G5319"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w proclamation|strong="G2782"\w* \w entrusted|strong="G4100"\w* \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w command|strong="G2003"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w our|strong="G2316"\w* \w Savior|strong="G4990"\w*.

\w To|strong="G2532"\w* \w Titus|strong="G5103"\w*, \w my|strong="G1473"\w* \w true|strong="G1103"\w* \w child|strong="G5043"\w* \w in|strong="G2596"\w* \w our|strong="G2316"\w* \w common|strong="G2839"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*: \w Grace|strong="G5485"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w peace|strong="G1515"\w* \w from|strong="G1515"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Father|strong="G3962"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w our|strong="G2316"\w* \w Savior|strong="G4990"\w*. Appointing Elders on Crete (1 Timothy 3:1–7; 1 Peter 5:1–4)

\w The|strong="G1722"\w* \w reason|strong="G5484"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w left|strong="G5484"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Crete|strong="G2914"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w would|strong="G2532"\w* \w set|strong="G2525"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w order|strong="G2443"\w* \w what|strong="G3588"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* unfinished \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w appoint|strong="G2525"\w* \w elders|strong="G4245"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w every|strong="G2596"\w* \w town|strong="G4172"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w directed|strong="G1299"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w*.

\w An|strong="G2192"\w* elder \w must|strong="G1135"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* blameless, \w the|strong="G1722"\w* husband \w of|strong="G1520"\w* \w but|strong="G1487"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w wife|strong="G1135"\w*,\f + \fr 1:6 \ft Or faithful to his wife\f* \w having|strong="G2192"\w* \w children|strong="G5043"\w* \w who|strong="G5101"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w believers|strong="G4103"\w* \w and|strong="G1135"\w* \w who|strong="G5101"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* open \w to|strong="G1722"\w* \w accusation|strong="G2724"\w* \w of|strong="G1520"\w* indiscretion \w or|strong="G2228"\w* insubordination.

\w As|strong="G5613"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*’s \w steward|strong="G3623"\w*, \w an|strong="G1510"\w* \w overseer|strong="G1985"\w* \w must|strong="G1163"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* above reproach—\w not|strong="G3361"\w* self-absorbed, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w quick-tempered|strong="G3711"\w*, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w given|strong="G3361"\w* \w to|strong="G1163"\w* drunkenness, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w violent|strong="G4131"\w*, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* greedy \w for|strong="G1063"\w* money.

Instead, he must \w be|strong="G3741"\w* \w hospitable|strong="G5382"\w*, a lover \w of|strong="G1342"\w* \w good|strong="G5358"\w*, \w self-controlled|strong="G4998"\w*, \w upright|strong="G1342"\w*, \w holy|strong="G3741"\w*, \w and|strong="G1342"\w* disciplined.

\w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w must|strong="G1510"\w* hold firmly \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w faithful|strong="G4103"\w* \w word|strong="G3056"\w* \w as|strong="G1722"\w* \w it|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w taught|strong="G1322"\w*, \w so|strong="G2443"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* can \w encourage|strong="G3870"\w* \w others|strong="G3588"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w sound|strong="G5198"\w* \w teaching|strong="G1322"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w refute|strong="G1651"\w* \w those|strong="G3588"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* contradict \w it|strong="G2532"\w*. Correcting False Teachers (1 Timothy 1:3–11)

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* rebellious \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w full|strong="G4183"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w empty|strong="G3151"\w* talk \w and|strong="G2532"\w* deception, \w especially|strong="G3122"\w* \w those|strong="G3588"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w circumcision|strong="G4061"\w*,

\w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w must|strong="G1163"\w* \w be|strong="G1163"\w* \w silenced|strong="G1993"\w*. \w For|strong="G5484"\w* \w the|strong="G3739"\w* \w sake|strong="G5484"\w* \w of|strong="G3624"\w* dishonorable \w gain|strong="G2771"\w*, \w they|strong="G3739"\w* undermine \w entire|strong="G3650"\w* \w households|strong="G3624"\w* \w and|strong="G1321"\w* \w teach|strong="G1321"\w* \w things|strong="G3739"\w* \w they|strong="G3739"\w* \w should|strong="G1163"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w*.

\w As|strong="G3004"\w* \w one|strong="G5100"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w their|strong="G2398"\w* \w own|strong="G2398"\w* \w prophets|strong="G4396"\w* \w has|strong="G5100"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, “\w Cretans|strong="G2912"\w* \w are|strong="G4396"\w* always \w liars|strong="G5583"\w*, \w evil|strong="G2556"\w* \w beasts|strong="G2342"\w*, lazy \w gluttons|strong="G1064"\w*.”\f + \fr 1:12 \ft This quote, also known as the Epimenides paradox, has been attributed to the Cretan philosopher Epimenides of Knossos.\f*

\w This|strong="G3778"\w* \w testimony|strong="G3141"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w true|strong="G3588"\w*. \w Therefore|strong="G1223"\w* \w rebuke|strong="G1651"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* sternly, \w so|strong="G2443"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w they|strong="G3588"\w* \w will|strong="G1510"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w sound|strong="G5198"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*

\w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w will|strong="G2532"\w* \w pay|strong="G4337"\w* \w no|strong="G3361"\w* \w attention|strong="G4337"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jewish|strong="G2451"\w* \w myths|strong="G3454"\w* \w or|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w commands|strong="G1785"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w men|strong="G3588"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* rejected \w the|strong="G2532"\w* truth.

\w To|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w pure|strong="G2513"\w*, \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w things|strong="G3956"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w pure|strong="G2513"\w*; \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w defiled|strong="G3392"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* unbelieving, \w nothing|strong="G3762"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w pure|strong="G2513"\w*. \w Indeed|strong="G2532"\w*, \w both|strong="G2532"\w* \w their|strong="G2532"\w* \w minds|strong="G3563"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w their|strong="G2532"\w* \w consciences|strong="G4893"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w defiled|strong="G3392"\w*.

\w They|strong="G2532"\w* \w profess|strong="G3670"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w by|strong="G4314"\w* \w their|strong="G2532"\w* \w actions|strong="G2041"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w deny|strong="G3588"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w*. \w They|strong="G2532"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* detestable, disobedient, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* unfit \w for|strong="G4314"\w* \w any|strong="G3956"\w* \w good|strong="G3956"\w* \w deed|strong="G2041"\w*.
